directions: Combine the baby carrots, potatoes, onion, celery, beans, cabbage, tomatoes, green beans, chicken broth, vegetable stock, water, basil, sage, thyme, and salt in a large pot; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low; cover. Simmer until vegetables are tender, about 90 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can great Northern beans, rinsed and drained
2 cups cut fresh green beans (1/2 inch pieces)
title: Homemade Vegetable Soup
